com.mygdx.game.controller

Class CarrierController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mygdx.game.controller.ShipController
      • com.mygdx.game.controller.CarrierController

  • public class CarrierController
extends ShipController
    CarrierController class created because of the differences needed in the methods related to the Carrier ship relating to the other ships
